basics.name: fiona willis
basics.label: I am a graduate in Biomedical science looking to build on my existing knowledge and skills set within a reputable life sciences laboratory or research institute. Having completed my Masters of Research I have developed a particular interest in cell/tissue engineering and regenerative medicine and would like to build my career within this field.

work.desc: handling inbound customer service for a mobile phone company

work.company: University of Glasgow MVLS, University of Glasgow MVLS
University of Paisley, Ayrshire and Arran
work.desc: Here I studied adult nursing within the school of nursing and midwifery and had various placements in hospital and healthcare settings locally. I completed the course attaining a DipHE in Healthcare Studies but chose not to register as nurse as I was coming to the realisation that I would maybe be better suited to researching healthcare than delivering it

work.company: Carrick Care Ltd, Prestwick South Ayrshire Scotland
work.desc:
Delivering day to day care of elderly and infirm residents as part of a care team and  under guidance of trained nursing team
Also worked weekend as their domestic assistant
